pr_title: [BEAM-7746] Stop automatically creating staticmethods in register_urn

timeline.message:
[BEAM-7746] Stop automatically creating staticmethods in register_urn

It confuses pylint, mypy, PyCharm, and humans.

timeline.author: udim
